quotes.text: You're not in traffic, you are traffic.
you waste so many weekdays waiting for the weekend.
A raindrop never feels responsible for the flood
Even the longest days are only twenty-four hours
A ship is always safest in the harbor, but that's not what it was built for.
A man must suffer if he is to remake himself, for he is both the marble and the sculptor.
True nobility is not in being superior to your fellow man, but in being superior to your former self.
Worrying means you suffer twice.
Chop your own wood and it will warm you twice.
Everyone has a plan until they get punched in the face.
A wise man speaks because he has something to say. A fool speaks because he has to say something.
You can let people walk all over you and they'll still complain that your not lying flat enough.
Don't set yourself on fire to keep others warm.
Every saint has a past, and every sinner has a future.
Comparison is the thief of joy.
Do you want to be right or do you want to learn?
Be decisive. Right or Wrong, make a decision. The road of life is paved with flat squirrels that couldn't make a decision.
If the grass looks greener on the other side, you probably forgot to water your own
Don't make permanent decisions based on temporary feelings.
If I have an apple and you have an apple, and we trade apples, then we both still have one apple. But if you have an idea and I have an idea, and we trade ideas, then we both have two ideas.
There are no big jobs or small jobs, only jobs that need to be done right.
Weâ€™d care a lot less about what others thought about us, if we realised how little they did.
Never attribute to malice that which is adequately explained by stupidity.
there's only two things in this life you can control: your thoughts and your behaviour.
You can't control what happens, but you can control how you react to it, and that's what will be remembered.
If the formula doesn't work, you change the formula.
